introduction:
Welcome to Concrete Structures
Laboratories are an important environment for students learning where students get hands-on training. In Civil Engineering, setting-up a real laboratory is challenging due to the high requirement of resources such as space and manpower, and high setup and maintenance cost. The Virtual Laboratory will allow the users to feel the environment which she/he will get in the real laboratories and enhance their teaching and learning experience.

experiments.name: Split Tensile Strength Test of Concrete (Cylinder)
Static Modulus of Elasticity of Concrete in compression

UG: Under Graduate students of Civil Engineering
PG: Post Graduate students of Civil Engineering

objective:
Reinforced concrete analysis and design is one of the important courses in Civil Engineering. In this laboratory on concrete structures, students will have the opportunity:

- to recall the fundamentals of reinforced concrete analysis and design

- to understand the theory behind an experimental procedure

- to apply the concepts learnt to perform experiments

- to analyze and present the output from the experiements

universities: The lab content is chosen such that it covers the syllabi of Concrete Structures Laboratory.

exp_name: Static Modulus of Elasticity of Concrete in compression
